resources.string:
1. Each game consist of 10 rounds. 

2. Each round you have the possibility to re-roll twice. 

3. The value chosen during each round, can only be chosen once. 

4. Before each re-roll you can chose which dices you want to roll and which you want to keep. 

5. The sum of a combination of one or more dices that equals to your choice will provide points,the choice Low equals to 3. 

Example: the dices 1,1,1,2,4 with the choice 4 will provide you 10 points, and the dices 1,2,3,4,5,6 with the choice Low will provide you 6 points (sum of 1,2,3).
